modules.description: Implements the Keva stemming algorithm for Russian and Ukrainian text processing. Operates on strings encoded in CP-1251, transforming words into their root forms. Useful for search indexing and text normalization tasks involving Cyrillic languages.

Implements the Porter2 stemming algorithm for reducing English words to their root forms. Operates on strings, transforming them into stemmed equivalents using an internal stateful buffer. Useful for text processing tasks like search indexing and natural language analysis where word normalization is required.

This module provides stemming functionality through two distinct algorithms: one for English text and another for Russian and Ukrainian text. It operates on string inputs, applying language-specific rules to reduce words to their root forms. Concrete use cases include search indexing, text normalization, and natural language processing tasks requiring linguistic reductions.
